description: Old wounds, carried anger. Let's set down this heavy load.

art.title: Resentment Weight Release
art.instruction: Draw yourself carrying heavy bags of resentment, then setting them down and walking free.
art.affirmation: I set down resentment's heavy load and walk forward free

art.title: Forgiveness Bridge Building
art.instruction: Draw a bridge from resentment to forgiveness - not for them, but for your freedom.
art.affirmation: I build bridges to forgiveness for my own freedom and peace

art.title: Prison Break Art
art.instruction: Draw yourself breaking free from resentment's prison. You hold the key.
art.affirmation: I hold the key to freedom from resentment's prison

breathwork.title: Resentment Release Breathing
breathwork.instruction: Breathe out resentment like dark smoke, breathe in fresh freedom and peace.
breathwork.affirmation: I breathe out resentment and inhale fresh freedom

breathwork.title: Forgiveness Breathing
breathwork.instruction: Breathe forgiveness - not for their sake, but for your own freedom from carrying anger.
breathwork.affirmation: I breathe forgiveness for my own freedom and peace

somatic.title: Resentment Burden Lifting
somatic.instruction: Physically mime lifting heavy resentment off your shoulders and setting it down.
somatic.affirmation: I lift resentment from my shoulders and set it down permanently

somatic.title: Heart Opening from Resentment
somatic.instruction: Open chest and heart area that resentment has closed and hardened.
somatic.affirmation: I open my heart and soften what resentment has hardened

cbt.title: Resentment Reality Check
cbt.instruction: Examine: Is holding resentment changing the past or helping your future?
cbt.affirmation: I focus my energy on what I can control - my response and my future

rebt.title: Justice Demand Challenge
rebt.instruction: Challenge 'Life must be fair.' Work for justice while accepting that unfairness exists.
rebt.affirmation: I work for justice while accepting life's inherent unfairness

neural.title: Freedom from Resentment Installation
neural.instruction: Install the feeling of complete freedom from carrying others' wrongs.
neural.affirmation: I am free from the burden of carrying others' mistakes

neural.title: Forgiveness for Freedom Programming
neural.instruction: Program understanding that forgiveness is for your freedom, not their absolution.
neural.affirmation: I forgive for my own freedom, not as a gift to those who hurt me

journaling.title: Resentment Cost Journal
journaling.instruction: Write honestly about what carrying resentment costs you in energy, peace, joy.
journaling.affirmation: I release resentment to reclaim my energy for joy and peace

journaling.title: Freedom Letter
journaling.instruction: Write a letter declaring your freedom from resentment and commitment to your own peace.
journaling.affirmation: I declare my freedom from resentment and choose peace

eft.title: Resentment Burden Tapping
eft.instruction: Tap: 'Even though I've carried this resentment, I choose to set it down for my own freedom and peace.'
eft.affirmation: I release resentment's burden and choose freedom and lightness

eft.title: Forgiveness Freedom Tapping
eft.instruction: Tap: 'Even though they hurt me, I forgive not for them but for my own freedom from carrying their wrong.'
eft.affirmation: I forgive for my freedom, not as a gift to those who harmed me

emdr.title: Resentment Memory Processing
emdr.instruction: Process resentment-causing memories with bilateral stimulation until emotional charge reduces.
emdr.affirmation: I process old hurts and free myself from resentment's grip

emdr.title: Freedom Resource Installation
emdr.instruction: Install the feeling of complete freedom from carrying others' wrongs through bilateral stimulation.
emdr.affirmation: I install freedom from resentment as my natural state

yoga.title: Heart Opening from Resentment
yoga.instruction: Practice heart-opening poses to soften what resentment has hardened in your chest.
yoga.affirmation: I open my heart and release resentment's hardening grip

yoga.title: Twists for Release
yoga.instruction: Practice spinal twists to wring out resentment like water from a cloth.
yoga.affirmation: I wring out old resentments and make space for fresh energy
